person.persName: Charles Flournoy Johnson (Louisville, Kentucky, commission merchant and soldier)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, commission merchant and soldier. Fayette County, Kentucky, native. Son of Henry Johnson and Elizabeth Johnson. Married to Mary Lawrence Tyler Johnson on December 4, 1856. Father of Mary C. Johnson. Attended the Kentucky Military Institute in Louisville, Kentucky. Attended Transylvania University in Lexington. Commission merchant in Louisville in 1860. Served as aide-de-camp to Simon B. Buckner in the Confederate Army.
